nodes.title: Added convenience method to add a single object with ContentTransformer to the HttpClientRequest
Adding more debugging to context propagation test.
Added toString() to ServerInfo for better inspection
Another attempt at fixing a flaky test.
Adding more debug info to the flaky test.
Implement HTTP follow redirect and fix issue #74
Added error handling and logging to remote observables.
Fixed unit tests checking for unsubscribe at source.  Used non-blocking ...
Added ability to name served remote observables.  Also, added the abilit...
Remove debugging code added temporarily in last commit.
Added ability to serve/connect-to a remote observable.
HttpRequest content setting API clean up
Removing compile time warnings and other redundant constructs.
Added HOST to header for every request
Build fix (removed testng usage in test)
Fixed the bug that RxServer#shutdown() doesn't shut down completely
Fix for issue #23 and other minor stuff
Reverted back the last change. There's API change in Netty, so we can't
Reverted version of netty to make releasing to artifactory possible
The internal OSS-RxNetty-release job failed due to unversioned .m2 directory. Added it to .gitignore per build team's suggestion
Renamed top package rx to io.reactivex
Added channel life cycle operation callback methods to HttpProtocolHandl...
Removed default host name from UriInfo
A list of minor changes addressing open issues.
Added workaround in test for Issue #12. Fixed the NPE in unsubscribe.
Create port on a non default port (80) for mock server.
Make sure connection error is passed to Observer.onError().
Fix the problem that HttpContent is delivered to ServerSentEventDecoder. Ensure proper handling of SSE whether chunked encoding is used or not. Added Junit tests.
Fixes buffer management issue in ServerSentEventDecoder.
Bug fix in Pooled connection reuse.
Introducing using a SocketAddress while creating servers.
Added a unit test that show a problem where when we setup a request to...
fix #344 read timeout not respected by client
Errors in the pipeline post response header delivery were lost.
Tcp Client and server implementations for 0.5.0
Unsubscribe from auto release timeout if a subscriber comes along.
Release RefCounted in UnicastContentSubject on dispose.
Fixes connection leak for SSL failures.
Only trigger the timeoutScheduler when not yet subscribed.
Fixed race in UnicastContentSubject and discard of connection
Use ephemeral ports in rxnetty-examples unit tests.
move classes from com.netflix to io.reactivex
Fix for stack overflow in CompositeHttpClient.shutdown().
Fixing close & finish order in HttpConnectionHandler.
update readme to reflect the org change
fixed example links on main README.md
Fixed a memory leak in SSEDecoder
Make sure to release content buffer
Updated so that the SSLEngines are lazy loaded.
Fixes #223 (Client connections receiving SSE responses should never be pooled & reused)
Fixes #216 (Remove use of Subject in HttpClientResponse and HttpServerRequest constructors)
Fixes #216 (Remove use of Subject in HttpClientResponse and HttpServerRequest constructors)
Sse migration from text to http package
Adding an option to use a threadpool for Request/Connection processing.
Adding a perf optimized helloworld example
Updated main README with the latest example.
Update README.md in the examples module.
HTTP client/server metrics are not getting published to servo.
Fixed: monitors are not registered with servo
Fix issue #154 - HttpClientRequest should always be passed relative URI.
Added convenience methods for building client and server using the default request ID context header
Fix for issue with HTTP pool connection and request content observable.
Correct generic declaration for withRawContent() API
Upgrade to Netty 4.1.51-Final to address CVE-2020-11612
interval instead of timer for the idleConnectionCleanup
closing connection instead of just creating observable
PooledConnection.close must be subscribed to be executed
Fix headers in markdown that now require an intervening space
Escape html special characters in default error response generator.
Make SSE content type check tolerant of charset
Simple example that connects to github securely.
Allow to return connections even if pool was already closed
Collect sequences of ByteBufs into a single ByteBuf
Empty body for zero length payloads
Fixes #496 - Marks netty-transport-native-epoll dependency as optional
Fixes #474 (disable auto release leaks buffers when content not subscribed)
Introduce Latency-based LoadBalancer with Power-of-Two fast selection
Potential Fix for Memory Leak Issue #466
Fix bug in RawRequest, add method to add headers map to avoid unnecessary copying
Check for success/failure on websocket handshake completion (fixes #452)
Handling content subscription after request/response completion.
Adding auto-release and replayable options for content.
Using numerus for percentiles in spectator plugin.
switch to using container-based inf for travis
Make the domain name resolver configurable
Adding an Eventloop backed RxJava scheduler.
Eager subscriptions to WS connection input in WSHandler causes upgrade failures
Added a messaging example over WebSockets
SSE now works with preceding channel handlers such as SSL
Moving all timeunits from millis to nanos.
Added server latency and total request processing times to HttpClientEventListener
Adding a facility to emit custom events on EventListener.
Fixes #377 (HttpClient should add the Host header for every request)
Fixes #378 (Case insensitive header check for WS upgrade)
